# AI Content & Web (AICW, former AI Chat Watch)

## Overview
AI Content & Web (AICW, former AI Chat Watch) is a free, open-source command-line tool for monitoring and analyzing how AI chatbots and large language models respond to specific questions over time. It provides comprehensive brand monitoring, competitive intelligence, and AI visibility analysis across 20+ AI models including ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, and more.

## Primary Purpose
AICW helps marketers, businesses, and researchers:
- Grade and audit AI visibility of websites
- Monitor brand mentions across multiple AI models
- Track competitive positioning in AI responses
- Analyze trends in AI recommendations over time
- Understand which competitors, products, and resources AI models recommend

## Key Features

### AI Visibility Grading
- Instant AI visibility scoring for any website
- Technical analysis of robots.txt, sitemaps, and structured data
- Content readability assessment for AI engines
- Actionable optimization recommendations
- Step-by-step fixes to improve AI discoverability

### Brand & Competitive Monitoring
- Query up to 20 AI models simultaneously
- Extract and analyze entity mentions (organizations, people, products, links)
- Track mention frequency, order of appearance, and influence metrics
- Identify trending topics and rising/falling mentions
- Compare positioning across different AI models

### Interactive Reports
- Beautiful, interactive HTML reports with visualizations
- Filter by AI model, trend, mentions, and influence
- Multiple views: graphs, tables, charts
- Export data to CSV for further analysis
- Track changes over time with historical data

### Privacy & Control
- Runs entirely on your local computer
- No signup or registration required
- You control all data and queries
- Open-source codebase for full transparency

## Installation & Usage

### Quick Start (No Installation)
```bash
npx @aichatwatch/aicw
```

### Check AI Visibility (30 seconds)
```bash
npx @aichatwatch/aicw ai-visibility YOURWEBSITE.com
```

### Global Installation
```bash
npm install -g @aichatwatch/aicw
aicw
```

### Requirements
- Node.js 18 or higher
- API key from OpenRouter (recommended, free tier available) or OpenAI

## Technical Details

### Supported AI Models
ChatGPT (GPT-4, GPT-3.5 with search), Claude (Sonnet, Opus with search), Google Gemini (Pro, Flash with search), Perplexity AI (Sonar, Sonar Pro), DeepSeek, Qwen, Llama models, and more - 20+ models total.

### Architecture
- CLI-based interface built with Node.js
- Modular design for easy extension
- Support for multiple AI providers (OpenRouter, OpenAI)
- Local data storage and processing
- HTML/JavaScript report generation

### Data Storage
Projects and reports are stored locally in:
`~/Library/Application Support/aicw/default-user/data/` (macOS)
User-specific storage can be configured via AICW_USER_NAME environment variable.

## Use Cases

### For Marketers
- Monitor how AI chatbots mention your brand vs competitors
- Track share of voice in AI recommendations
- Identify optimization opportunities for AI visibility
- Understand which content AI models cite and recommend

### For Businesses
- Ensure AI can find and recommend your website
- Competitive intelligence on AI positioning
- Track reputation across AI platforms
- Optimize content for AI discoverability

### For Researchers
- Analyze AI model behaviors and biases
- Compare responses across different models
- Track evolution of AI recommendations over time
- Study entity relationships in AI outputs

## Cost Efficiency
The tool itself is completely free. AI model costs are typically minimal:
- Many foundation models (Llama, Qwen) are free via providers like OpenRouter
- Example: 5 questions across 3 premium models with analysis = ~$0.30 total
- No monthly fees or subscriptions

## Links & Resources
- Website: https://aicw.io
- GitHub Repository: https://github.com/aichatwatch/aicw
- NPM Package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@aichatwatch/aicw
- Sample Reports: https://aicw.io/ranking/
- Report Issues: https://github.com/aichatwatch/aicw/issues

100% free and open-source. Contributions welcome via GitHub pull requests and issues.

## Target Audience
Primary users: Marketers, SEO professionals, brand managers, competitive intelligence analysts, business owners, content strategists, AI researchers, and digital marketing agencies.
